name: AfterRave
description:
This was made for The Themed Horror Game Jam #8: https://itch.io/jam/themed-horror-game-jam-8

I'm still learning how to do Environmental Storytelling. Previous learning here: https://snakewinter.itch.io/welcome-to-bowl-o-world

LIGHTS WARNING: This game uses dynamic lighting and the title light flashes between green and red. The lighting is provided by glow stick. There are some pulsing lights.

CONTENT WARNING: Blood.

Controls: 

Movement: WASD/Mouse

Interaction: E

Jump: Space

Textures/imagery/concept art created using www.craiyon.com and then I edited them.

Sounds (in-game versions were edited by me):

Water  (public domain): 

https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Bathtub_water_splashes.ogg

Door (public domain):

https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Door_handle_creaking.ogg

Monster  (public domain): 

https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Sheep_bleating.ogg

Nature sounds (Creative Commons)

https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Whales_and_Dolphins_whale_nature_sounds_...

Drill (Creative Commons):

https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Mould_grinding.webm

Alarm  (Creative Commons):

https://commons.m.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Alarmclock-mechanical.ogg

Coppercube "Do later" Extension: 

https://www.ambiera.com/coppercube/download_extensions.html

This game was worked on from August 11 - August 15, 2022.
